channel.title: Changing rights[shard]
channel.description: How do you change the player rights on a shard base. I looked in my character file but it is a .dat and it does no good. Thanks.

item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Okay I’ll try it thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing rights[shard]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“pk2play, post:1, topic:390303”]How do you change the player rights on a shard base.
I looked in my character file but it is a .dat and it does no good.
Thanks.[/quote]

The easiest way is to create a command (if one doesn’t already exist) that changes your rights, and then save your file.

The other way is a bit more technical. You need to get a hex editor, open up your character file, find a string similar to “player-rights”. The next byte is the character rights. You can change that to 2, 3, or any other value you wish.

Read full topic
